name: Global Trends Trisha Bedding Quilt Set

reviews.name: Global Trends Trisha Bedding Quilt Set
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a white set for my daughter's room and after searching on dozens of websites, I decided to buy this and try it out. I got it in white and love that is machines washable ( unlike others that I looked at) It is very soft and light, and seems to be well made. I also bought a ruffled bed skirt to make it even more feminine but not too busy. The shams have a beautiful trim on them, but the set just looks simple and very elegant. Great choice.
reviews.title: Beautiful, washable and great price

reviews.name: Global Trends Trisha Bedding Quilt Set
reviews.reviewText: This quilt is just what I was looking for. Matches any bedroom decor, beautiful and light weight.
reviews.title: Great Quilt!

reviews.name: Global Trends Trisha Bedding Quilt Set
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful quilt. Just what I wanted for the right price. Goes perfect with my new room decor.
reviews.title: Great white quilt

reviews.name: Global Trends Trisha Bedding Quilt Set
reviews.reviewText: Very glad that I made this purchase. This quilt is exactly what I was looking for. It's lightweight enough to use in the summer, but heavy enough to be comfortable in the winter. I was a little worried about the raw edges of the ruffles snagging, but I haven't had a problem with that, even after everyday use & washing it three times. Highly recommend!
reviews.title: Love my new quilt!
